description:
Network manager is FlatDHCP, I create two tenants and associate each with a network.
When creating VM to get fixed IP, I found the VM got two tenant fixed IP, 
and only can be connected via the first tennat's IP.

It doesn't make sense.
title: VM always gets the other tenant fixed IP in FlatDHCP mode

comments.content:
Network manager is FlatDHCP, I create two tenants and associate each with a network.
When creating VM to get fixed IP, I found the VM got two tenant fixed IP, 
and only can be connected via the first tennat's IP.

It doesn't make sense.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~willfly0620

comments.content: It sounds like this would be more appropriate as a question in the "Answers" section.  Much more detail is needed for a bug report.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
